title: Leave Buster
body: So today I played a game, I had a bug where i couldnt buy items at the shop, all i could do was move and use my skills. I left to rectify the issue, On reconnecting I got 'the game will now exit due to prolonged inactivity' which meant i had to reconnect a 2nd time. to top it off leave buster came on saying I would not agree to leave anymore games. This is pathetic. This bug has occured twice where i cant purchase items and for me to leave to help my team out so i can buy items 25 mins in, and then to be kicked and have to reconnect is disgusting, cudos to riot for makeing people afk from the game longer.

replies.body:
> On reconnecting I got 'the game will now exit due to prolonged inactivity' which meant i had to reconnect a 2nd time. 


That sounds to me like you took so long to reconnect the game realised you were AFK and auto-kicked you. The same thing happens if you sit in base and don't move for like 10 minutes.

If it seriously takes you that long to connect to a game, I suggest getting an upgrade on your computer, or you know, at least giving it some basic maintenance.

> leave buster came on saying I would not agree to leave anymore games.

That happens the **FIRST** time you get marked as AFK/DC. No worries.
